about_the_game:
As a vengeful sorcerer unleashes a cursed fog upon the ancient Welsh Kingdom of Dyfed, a warrior-king finds himself entangled with beasts from the mythical Otherworld of Annwn. To save his realm, he embarks on a quest to uncover the origins of the curse - and unlock the secrets necessary to thwart its devastating grip.


As Pryderi, King of the ancient Welsh realm of Dyfed, you'll unravel the mystery behind this magical cataclysm. Uncover hidden tales and timeless stories across the vast sprawling forests, mountains and coastlines of mythical Wales - all while evading enchanted animals and escaping a relentless cursed fog...

Tales from the Mabinogion is inspired by the oldest Welsh folklore, the Mabinogion, the first written work in the Western fantasy literary tradition. The game features Welsh as the primary language, translated by National Eisteddfod Crown winner Rhys Iorwerth, subtitled to enable players to follow the story while remaining fully immersed in the spirit of ancient Wales.



  • Authentic Welsh Narration: Experience the story entirely in the Welsh language, narrated by award-winning voice artist Phil Rowe.
  • Mythical Storytelling: Delve into the ancient tales of The Mabinogion, the earliest work of Western fantasy literature, brought to life in a video game for the first time with the help of New York Times Bestselling author and former Games Workshop designer, Gav Thorpe.
  • Immersive Gameplay Experience: Explore beautifully crafted environments, follow the trails of the beasts of Annwn, flee the deadly cursed fog, and uncover ancient secrets as you navigate the cursed lands of Dyfed and reveal the thousand-year-old narratives contained within the pages of the Mabinogion.
  • Experienced Solo Dev: Tales from the Mabinogion is developed by Stevan Anastasoff, a game designer whose past credits include Assassin's Creed, Warhammer Online, and For Honor.
  • Stunning Visuals: The Kingdom of Dyfed is presented in a unique, shader-driven “oil painting” visual style, inspired by the works of Erin Hanson, Van Gogh, and Claude Monet.
  • Epic Musical Score: Surround yourself with the enchanting music of renowned Welsh folk musician Oliver Wilson-Dickson.

short_description: Venture into the enchanted realms of Ancient Wales in Tales from the Mabinogion. As King Pryderi, navigate mystical forests, rugged mountains, and captivating coastlines. Unravel ancient secrets, confront dark forces, and save your kingdom from a looming, catastrophic curse.
